document.full_text: a year ago, the cleveland cavaliers had the best record in the nba, the league's best player in lebron james and were a red-hot championship tip.
document.title: "king-less" cavs target bright finish to dark nba year
lines_and_colors: a year ago, the cleveland cavaliers had the best record in the nba, the league's best player in lebron james and were a red-hot championship tip.
